title: DiSSCo Registry Profile
description: JSON Schema- and Latimer Core-based profile describing a registry of collection facilities for the DiSSCo RI in a standardized way.

Registry.description: A registry assembling the authorative list of DiSSCo collection facility records.

properties.name: hasRegistryRecord
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of DiSSCo collection facility records.

items.description: Each item in the array is the record of a DiSSCo collection facility. These records share in common the  DiSSCo record-level schema defined in the linked file.
